targets.query:
import "array"

empty_slots = from(bucket: "vechain")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "recent_slots" and r["_field"] == "filled" and r["_value"] == 0)
  |> group() // Ensure all data is in one table
  |> tableFind(fn: (key) => true) // Get the table
  |> getColumn(column: "_time") // Extract the "_time" column as an array

proposors = from(bucket: "vechain")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "recent_slots" and r["_field"] == "proposer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(set: empty_slots , value: r["_time"]))

blocks = from(bucket: "vechain")
   |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
   |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "recent_slots" and r["_field"] == "block_number")
   |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(set: empty_slots , value: r["_time"]))

join(tables: {proposors: proposors, blocks: blocks}, on: ["_time"])
    |> keep(columns: ["_value_proposors", "_value_blocks", "_time"])
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with block: r._value_blocks }))
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with proposer: r._value_proposors }))
    |> keep(columns: ["proposer", "block", "_time"])

from(bucket: "vechain")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "block_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "epoch")
  |> group(columns: ["epoch"])
  |> last()

from(bucket: "vechain")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "block_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "epoch")
  |> group(columns: ["epoch"])
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value - uint(v:1)}))

from(bucket: "vechain")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "block_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "epoch")
  |> group(columns: ["epoch"])
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value - uint(v:2)}))

from(bucket: "vechain")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "block_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "best_block_number")
  |> group(columns: ["best_block_number"])
  |> last()

from(bucket: "vechain")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "block_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "finalized")
  |> group(columns: ["finalized"])
  |> last()

from(bucket: "vechain")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "block_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "justified_block")
  |> group(columns: ["justified_block"])
  |> last()

import "date"

a = from(bucket:"vechain")
  |> range(start: date.sub(d:5h, from:v.timeRangeStop), stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "recent_slots" and r._field == "epoch")

b = from(bucket:"vechain")
  |> range(start: date.sub(d:5h, from:v.timeRangeStop), stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "recent_slots" and r._field == "filled")

c = from(bucket:"vechain")
  |> range(start: date.sub(d:5h, from:v.timeRangeStop), stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "recent_slots" and r._field == "proposer")

d = join(tables: {b: b, c: c}, on: ["_time"])

join(tables: {a: a, d: d}, on: ["_time"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_time"])
  |> duplicate(column: "_value", as: "epoch")
  |> duplicate(column: "_value_b", as: "filled")
  |> duplicate(column: "_value_c", as: "proposer")
  |> drop(columns: ["_value"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_value_b"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_value_c"])

import "date"
a = from(bucket:"vechain")
  |> range(start: date.sub(d:5h, from:v.timeRangeStop), stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "blockspace_utilization" and r._field == "epoch")

b = from(bucket:"vechain")
  |> range(start: date.sub(d:5h, from:v.timeRangeStop), stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "blockspace_utilization" and r._field == "utilization")

join(tables: {a: a, b: b}, on: ["_time"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_time"])
  |> duplicate(column: "_value_a", as: "epoch")
  |> duplicate(column: "_value_b", as: "_value")
  |> drop(columns: ["_value_a"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_value_b"])

from(bucket: "vechain")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "block_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "current_epoch")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "vechain")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "block_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "finalized")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "vechain")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "block_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "block_number")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "vechain")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "block_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "liveliness")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "vechain")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "block_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "total_txs")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "vechain")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "block_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "total_clauses")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

b = from(bucket: "vechain")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "total_clauses")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with epoch: uint(v:uint(v: r.block_number) / uint(v:180))}))
  |> duplicate(column: "epoch", as: "tag")
  |> group(columns: ["epoch"])
  |> sum()
  |> group(columns: ["tag"])
  |> duplicate(column: "_value", as: "total_clauses")
  |> drop(columns: ["_value"])

a = from(bucket: "vechain")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "total_txs")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with epoch: uint(v:uint(v: r.block_number) / uint(v:180))}))
  |> duplicate(column: "epoch", as: "tag")
  |> group(columns: ["epoch"])
  |> sum()
  |> group(columns: ["tag"])
  |> duplicate(column: "_value", as: "total_txs")
  |> drop(columns: ["_value"])

join(tables: {b:b, a:a}, on: ["epoch"])

from(bucket: "vechain")
  |> range(start: 0, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "block_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "slots_per_block")
  |> group(columns: ["slots_per_block"])
  |> last()

from(bucket: "vechain")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "recent_slots")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "filled")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] == 0)
  |> count()
  |> yield(name: "filled")

from(bucket: "vechain")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "block_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "blocks_slots_percentage")
  |> group(columns: ["blocks_slots_percentage"])
  |> last()

from(bucket: "vechain")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "block_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "current_epoch")
  |> group(columns: ["current_epoch"])
  |> last()

from(bucket:"vechain")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "block_stats" 
  )
  |> keep(columns: ["signer"])
  |> group()
  |> distinct(column: "signer")
  |> count()

from(bucket: "vechain")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "block_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "block_gas_usage")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "vechain")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "block_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "block_gas_used")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "vechain")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "block_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "block_mine_gap")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "vechain")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "block_gas_used")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with epoch: uint(v:uint(v: r.block_number) / uint(v:180))}))
  |> duplicate(column: "epoch", as: "tag")
  |> group(columns: ["epoch"])
  |> sum()
  |> group(columns: ["tag"])
  |> duplicate(column: "_value", as: "block_gas_used")
  |> drop(columns: ["_value"])

from(bucket: "vechain")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "block_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "b3tr_gas_percent")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "vechain")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "block_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "storage_size")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "vechain")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "b3tr_gas_percent")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with epoch: uint(v:uint(v: r.block_number) / uint(v:180))}))
  |> duplicate(column: "epoch", as: "tag")
  |> group(columns: ["epoch"])
  |> sum()
  |> group(columns: ["tag"])
  |> duplicate(column: "_value", as: "b3tr_gas_percent")
  |> drop(columns: ["_value"])

from(bucket: "vechain")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "storage_size")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with epoch: uint(v:uint(v: r.block_number) / uint(v:180))}))
  |> duplicate(column: "epoch", as: "tag")
  |> group(columns: ["epoch"])
  |> sum()
  |> group(columns: ["tag"])
  |> duplicate(column: "_value", as: "storage_size")
  |> drop(columns: ["_value"])

from(bucket: "vechain")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "block_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "total_clauses")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "vechain")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "block_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "b3tr_total_clauses")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")
